roleset.name: take a smaller sample from a larger sample
roleset.note: SUBSAMPLE-V, SUBSAMPLING-N NOTES: added by Julia for Cryo.

role.descr: new size/measurement of the new sample

example.name: subsample-v
example.text: In all, 43 profiles were retained for analysis and subsampled to 8 Hz, from which pond surface rms height (sw), correlation length (lw) and wae height spectra were derived.
